text: Willi Fuggerer (11 September 1941 â€“ September 2015) was a German track cyclist. He was born in Nuremberg. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in the 2000 m tandem and 1000 m sprint and finished in third and fifth place, respectively.Willi Fuggerer . cyclingarchives.com ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:German cyclists Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Germany Category:Medalists at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nuremberg
